title: Controller Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at Equal Access (San Francisco, CA) in Apr 2014
Interview Descriptions: It was conducted by COO. Then I was interviewed by the CEO and Programs Manager. There was one more additional staff who was newly hired who was also in the panel.
Interview Questions: Describe how is this job a good fit for your skills. Describe your accounting skills for the governmental accounting. Describe your skills in managing people.
